(1) Mentioned by Professor Owen under the name 
of Bubalus in the Brit. Assoc. Rep. for 1856 
p72.
The following section shows the exact relation of 
the gravel to the beds above which are probably 'rain 
wash' of different ages. <s>The bare scarp at the top<\s> 
<s>against which it abuts<\s> shows the boundary of the 
They all abut against the Oolitic Limestone, <s>the<\s> 
which appears at the <s>top of the sect<\s> surface at 
a slight distance above the cutting. For the heights 
which prove that the gravel belongs to the Low Level 
series of M<sup>r<\sup> Prestwich[?] F.R.S., I am indebted to 
the Rev. H.H. Winwood.
